official_title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to respond to a subpoena duces tecum issued in a Grand Jury Investigation pending in the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk of the House to respond to a subpoena duces tecum issued in a Grand Jury Investigation pending in the United States District Court for the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Clerk of the House to respond to a subpoena duces tecum issued in a Grand Jury Investigation pending in the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia.
